languages.text: "Не испытав боль, физическую или душевную, невозможно осознать ценность тела и духа. Боль уходит, и остается опыт. Опыт оттачивается, подобно клинку, и становится мастерством. Я никогда не жалела о стезе, по которой мне было суждено пройти".

"It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."
languages.original_text: "Не испытав боль, физическую или душевную, невозможно осознать ценность тела и духа. Боль уходит, и остается опыт. Опыт оттачивается, подобно клинку, и становится мастерством. Я никогда не жалела о стезе, по которой мне было суждено пройти".

traits.locale_text: "Without experiencing pain, physical or emotional, one cannot understand the value of their body and spirit. Pain goes away, but experience stays. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted the way I was always meant to tread."

"Without experiencing pain, physical or emotional, one cannot understand the value of their body and spirit. Pain goes away, but experience stays. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted the way I was always meant to tread."

"It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you have never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the path I was destined to tread."

Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

languages.text: «Es imposible apreciar el valor del cuerpo y el espíritu cuando nunca se ha experimentado dolor físico ni emocional. El dolor es transitorio, pero la experiencia perdura. La experiencia se puede afilar como una espada hasta convertirse en maestría. Jamás he lamentado recorrer el hilo que estoy destinada a seguir».
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

traits.locale_text: «Es imposible apreciar el valor del cuerpo y el espíritu cuando nunca se ha experimentado dolor físico ni emocional. El dolor es transitorio, pero la experiencia perdura. La experiencia se puede afilar como una espada hasta convertirse en maestría. Jamás he lamentado recorrer el hilo que estoy destinada a seguir».

languages.text: 「肉体的あるいは精神的な痛みを経験したことがなければ、自分の肉体と精神の価値を理解することは不可能よ。痛みは一時的なものだけど、経験は永遠の者。経験は刃のように研ぎ澄まされ、極みへと達する。私は自分が辿るべき運命の糸を辿ったことを後悔したことはない」
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体的あるいは精神的な痛みを経験したことがなければ、自分の肉体と精神の価値を理解することは不可能よ。痛みは一時的なものだけど、経験は永遠の者。経験は刃のように研ぎ澄まされ、極みへと達する。私は自分が辿るべき運命の糸を辿ったことを後悔したことはない」
「肉体的あるいは精神的な痛みを経験したことがなければ、自分の肉体と精神の価値を理解することは不可能よ。痛みは一時的なものだけど、経験は永遠の者。経験は刃のように研ぎ澄まされ、極みへと達する。私は自分が辿るべき運命の糸を辿ったことを後悔したことはない」

languages.text: “若从未经历过肉体或心灵的痛苦，便永远无法理解肉体与精神的价值。痛苦是暂时的，但经验是持久不衰的。经验可以像刀刃一样越磨越利，最终致臻化境。我注定会沿着这样的丝线前进，我一刻都没有后悔过。”
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

traits.locale_text: “若从未经历过肉体或心灵的痛苦，便永远无法理解肉体与精神的价值。痛苦是暂时的，但经验是持久不衰的。经验可以像刀刃一样越磨越利，最终致臻化境。我注定会沿着这样的丝线前进，我一刻都没有后悔过。”

languages.text: "Es ist unmöglich, den Wert Eures Körpers und Geistes zu ermessen, wenn Ihr niemals körperlichen oder emotionalen Schmerz erfahren habt. Schmerz geht vorüber, aber die Erfahrung bleibt. Erfahrung kann geschärft werden wie eine Klinge, bis man Meisterschaft darin entwickelt hat. Ich habe niemals bereut, dem Faden zu folgen, dem zu folgen mir bestimmt war."
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

Schmerz geht vorüber, aber die Erfahrung bleibt. Erfahrung kann geschärft werden wie eine Klinge, bis man Meisterschaft darin entwickelt hat. Ich habe niemals bereut, dem Faden zu folgen, dem zu folgen mir bestimmt war."

"Es ist unmöglich, den Wert Eures Körpers und Geistes zu ermessen, wenn Ihr niemals körperlichen oder emotionalen Schmerz erfahren habt. Schmerz geht vorüber, aber die Erfahrung bleibt. Erfahrung kann geschärft werden wie eine Klinge, bis man Meisterschaft darin entwickelt hat. Ich habe niemals bereut, dem Faden zu folgen, dem zu folgen mir bestimmt war."

languages.text: « Il est impossible de comprendre la pleine valeur de votre corps et de votre esprit si vous n'avez jamais connu la souffrance physique ou psychique. La douleur est temporaire, mais l'expérience demeure et elle peut être affûtée comme une lame pour se muer en expertise. Je n'ai jamais regretté d'avoir suivi le fil qui m'était destiné. »
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."

languages.text: "Fiziksel veya duygusal acı çekmeden vücudunun ve ruhunun değerini bilmek imkânsızdır. Acılar geçiciyken tecrübe kalıcıdır. Tecrübeyi kılıç gibi bileyip ustalığa dönüştürmek mümkündür. Kaderimin örüldüğü iplikten asla pişman olmadım."
languages.original_text: "It is impossible to understand the value of your body and spirit if you've never experienced physical or emotional pain. Pain is temporary, but experience endures. Experience can be sharpened like a blade and turned into mastery. I have never regretted walking the thread I was destined to follow."
